tooltip.soaring_depths.ores.copper: This ore can be found between Y-levels 40 and 255.
tooltip.soaring_depths.ores.zinc: This ore can be found between Y-levels 30 and 200.
tooltip.soaring_depths.ores.lead: Thise ore can be found below Y = 40.
tooltip.soaring_depths.ores.iron: This ore can be found at Y = 100 and below.
tooltip.soaring_depths.ores.coal: This ore can be found at all heights in the world.
tooltip.soaring_depths.ores.gold: Thise ore can be found below Y = 40.
tooltip.soaring_depths.ores.redstone: Thise ore can be found below Y = 40.
tooltip.soaring_depths.ores.lapis: Thise ore can be found below Y = 40.
tooltip.soaring_depths.ores.diamond: Thise ore can be found below Y = 40.
tooltip.soaring_depths.ores.arcane_cryst: Thise ore can be found below Y = 40.
description.soaring_depths.xpetrified_or: Throw some experience orbs into the ultimate trash can to obtain this solified form of experience.
description.soaring_depths.corrupti_dust: Throw on the ground with Dark Matter to create a black hole.
description.soaring_depths.dark_matter: Throw on the ground with Corrupti Dust to create a black hole.

Blocks monster spawns in a 25 block radius
